text: Duel () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Petrov.ПоединокПОЕДИНОК (1957) It stars Nikolai Komissarov, Andrei Popov, and Yuri Puzyryov. == Actors == * Nikolai Komissarov as Lieutenant Shulgovich * Andrei Popov as Vasily Nazansky * Yuri Puzyryov as Georgy Romashov * Mikhail Nazvanov as Vladimir Nikolayev * Irina Skobtseva as Aleksandra Nikolayeva * Lidiya Sukharevskaya as Raisa Peterson == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Petrov
title: Duel (1957 movie)
